descriptionHtml:
This mod gives you a follower to take with you and not worry if he dies or not. I made him for the Boethiah quest because I didn\'t want anyone already in the game to die. I made this for myself.

He has a bow and arrow - at least he isn\'t completely useless when taking him with you!

The follower is called \"Trusting Beggar\" and can be found in Whiterun just beyond Breezehome hanging around the side-paths.

Have fun leading a beggar to his own death!


PS: Also available on Steam Workshop! - [url=\"http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=112496693\"]http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=112496693[/url]
author: Floorman
